CommSubscriptionTiming.name: CommSubscriptionTiming
CommSubscriptionTiming.description: Represents a customer's timing preferences for receiving a communication subscription.

CommSubscriptionConsentId.description: Required. ID of the associated communication subscription consent record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. Name of the communication subscription timing record.

Offset.description: The amount of time before or after an event or the specific day of the week to communicate with the contact point. Set the unit of time in the Unit field.

PreferredTimeEnd.description: End of the preferred time span in which to reach the customer.

PreferredTimeStart.description: Start of the preferred time span in which to reach the customer.

PreferredTimeZone.description: Time zone of the preferred time span.

Unit.description: The unit of time that works with the Offset field to determine the communication timing.
